#summary MongoDB data structure.
#labels Phase-Design

 * *foo*: _files_ {
  * *{{{_id}}}*: _main URI = SHA256 of type and URL of main source_ (ObjectId), 
  * *c*: _random_,
  * *z*: _size_,
  * *ls*: _last seen date_, 
  * *fs*: _first seen date_,
  * *ct*: _content type_,
  * *bl*: _0=ok, 1=blocked file_, 
  * *s*: _server where is located_, 
  * *tt*: _times touched_,
  * *md*: _metadata_ {
   * _key_:_value_,
   * ...},
  * *fn*: _filenames_ {
   * _filename-crc_: { *n*: _filename_, *x*: _extension_},
   * ...},
  * *src*: _sources_ { 
   * _URI = SHA256 of type and URL_: {
    * *t*:_type f source_, 
    * *url*: _unique locator for file_,
    * *fn*: _filenames_ {
     * _filename-crc_:{ *l*:_last sources count_, *m*:_max sources count_}, 
     * ...},
    * *l*:_last sources count_, 
    * *m*:_max sources count_ }, 
   * ...},
  * *vs*: _votes_ {
   * _language_: {*va*: _vote average_, *vc*: _votes count_}, 
   * ...},
  * *cm*: _comments_ {
   * _language_: _count_,
   * ...} }
 

 * *indir*: _mappings URI {{{<->}}} file_ {
  * *{{{_id}}}*: _URI from_ (ObjectId),
  * *t*: _main URI pointed to_ (ObjectId),
  * *s*: _server where is located_ }

 * *server*: _data servers on the system_ {
  * *{{{_id}}}*: _server id_,
  * *lt*: _last touched_, 
  * *ls*: _last sphinxed_,
  * *ss*: _touched since sphinx_,
  * *ip*: _IP address_,
  * *p*: _TCP port_,
  * *c*: _files count_, 
  * *mc*: _max supported files count_ }

 * *users*: _web users_ {
  * *{{{_id}}}*,
  * *username*,
  * *email*,
  * *password*,
  * *location*,
  * *karma*, 
  * *token*, 
  * *created*, 
  * *type* }

 * *comment*: _files comments_ {
  * *{{{_id}}}*: _idUser-timestamp_,
  * *f*: _idFile_ (index1),
  * *l*: _language_ (index1),
  * *d*: _date_ (index1),
  * *k*: _user karma_,
  * *t*: _comment text_ }

 * *comm_vote*: _votes to comments_ {
  * *{{{_id}}}*: _idComment-idUser_,
  * *u*: _idUser_,
  * *f*: _idFile_,
  * *k*: _user karma_,
  * *d*: _date_ }

 * *vote*: _files votes_ {
  * *{{{_id}}}*: _idFile-idUser_,
  * *u*: _idUser_ (index1),
  * *k*: _user karma_,
  * *d*: _date_,
  * *l*: _language_ }
